mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CART(MEMBERID, PRODUCTNUM, PRODUCTSTOCK) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{productNum}, #{productStock})
mapper.update: UPDATE CART SET PRODUCTSTOCK = #{productStock} WHERE CARTNUM = #{cartNum}
mapper.select: SELECT A.CARTNUM, A.MEMBERID, A.PRODUCTNUM, A.PRODUCTSTOCK, P.PRODUCTNAME, P.PRODUCTPRICE FROM CART A LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT P ON A.PRODUCTNUM = P.PRODUCTNUM WHERE A.MEMBERID = #{memberId}
SELECT * FROM CART WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND PRODUCTNUM = #{productNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE CART WHERE MEMBERID = #{memberId} AND PRODUCTNUM = #{productNum}
